Traits.Name: Echolocation
Traits.Content: The Bloop can sense its surroundings within 120 feet regardless of visibility, allowing it to detect creatures even in complete darkness.

Traits.Name: Sound Pulse
Traits.Content: The Bloop can emit a powerful sound pulse that disrupts nearby creatures, causing them to have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws while within 60 feet of it.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Bloop makes one attack with Deep-Sea Slam and two attacks with Tentacle Lash.

Actions.Name: Deep-Sea Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (6d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Tentacle Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Resonating Shockwave (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Bloop unleashes a powerful sound wave that resonates through the water in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save are also deafened until the end of their next turn.
